content.description: The crack in a right facing book 20 feet in front of The "First Steps Are The Hardest".
content.location: Climb off to the climbers right.

content.description: Look for the large dike or extrusion and clip your way to the top of a small spire of sorts.
content.protection: Five bolts to a bolted anchor
content.location: Above and right of the orange boulder at the mouth of the canyon is a small white spire with a large dike at the start.  Here you will find this sport climb

climbs.name: Grahambo
climbs.fa: Justin Slagle, Eliza Penick, Dave Cox

content.description: Five bolts to a bolted anchor. Cool juggy start with a knob mantle to another slabby 9crux) finish. Faces north.
content.location: Located on the face to the right of The GBM.

content.description: Climb the right edge of a pillar/fin of rock  Four bolts to a bolted anchor.  Rap off the backside.
content.location: Located up the hillside (east) of the Graham's Playpen narrow corridor.

content.description: Five bolts to a bolted anchor.  Start with a stem up the narrow-walled corridor to clip the first bolt, then up jugs to a slabby finish.
content.location: Hike further in the narrow corridor past The First Steps and The Birth Canal until you see a wall on your left (west) with two bolted climbs on it. This is the left one.

climbs.name: The First Steps Are the Hardest
climbs.fa: Justin Slagle, Dave Cox, Tom Bonnet

content.description: Four bolts to a bolted anchor.  After a few slab moves  (crux), head up a lumpy featured face.
content.location: This is the second bolted climb you come to on the left  (west) as you enter a narrow corridor.  Faces east.

content.description: Seven bolts to a bolted anchor.
content.location: Located at the north end of the narrow corridor on a separate tower-like formation.  Faces south.

climbs.name: Cutting Teeth
climbs.fa: Matt Rauch et al., FFA: Kenton Card

content.description: Four bolts to bolted anchor  (same anchor as The First Steps and Birth Canal).
content.location: Located just left of The First Steps are the Hardest.

content.description: Climb up the dark face right past three bolts to a bolted anchor. Start up a slot chimney and face climb up the slot.
content.location: Located just right of The First Steps are the Hardest.  Shares same anchor as The First Steps...

content.description: Three bolts plus gear to a bolted anchor.  (Same anchor as Grahambo).
content.protection: quick draws and small to med cams.
content.location: This is the crack/ramp located just right of Grahambo.
